text: Teresa Giudice You Know Who's a Bitch? Not - So - Nice Immigrant Sofia Vergara Teresa Giudice Calls Sofia Vergara a Bitch and a Not - So - Nice Immigrant EXCLUSIVE Teresa Giudice thinks Sofia Vergara acted like a ` ` bitch'' during a photo - op, which is totally out of line because - - according to Teresa - - Sofia's an immigrant and oughta act nice. The'RHONJ'star spilled the beans last week during a panel discussion - - ` ` Gettin Real With The Housewives'' - - where the audience asked about her best and worst celeb encounters.
